properties.name: ascendingText
properties.description: Specifies text for the context menu item that sets an ascending sort order in a column.

properties.name: clearText
properties.description: Specifies text for the context menu item that clears sorting settings for a column.

properties.name: descendingText
properties.description: Specifies text for the context menu item that sets a descending sort order in a column.

properties.name: showSortIndexes
properties.description: Specifies whether to display sort indexes in column headers. Applies only when **sorting**.[mode] is "multiple" and data is sorted by two or more columns.
